summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details charges related to customs duties and taxes for a shipment sent from New York to Paris, including a breakdown of fees and the total amount due.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the sender or recipient of the shipment.

persons.name: Valdson J. Epstein
persons.context: Valdson J. Epstein is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment sent to Paris.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is sending a shipment to Valdson J. Epstein, indicating a familial or close personal relationship.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Delivery
events.description: A shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein was delivered to Valdson J. Epstein in Paris.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-153-78512, dated December 12, 2002.
The total charges for the shipment amount to USD $64.41.
The shipment included customs duties and taxes paid to French Customs on behalf of Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Valdson J. Epstein is identified as the recipient of the shipment in Paris.
The invoice indicates that claims for refunds of duties and taxes must be submitted by the importer.
